title: Gamification-Based Flipped Learning Course for Strengthening Pharmacy Library Utilization Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Designed for R&D managers/leaders in pharmaceutical companies, requiring learning design that enables smartphone-centric interaction and field applicability in constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can establish target literature search strategies using three or more specialized databases.
Learners can select credible materials by applying a five-stage framework for evaluating academic information.
Learners can collaboratively design a virtual research project information management system in a gamification environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
